t: Amazon Prime Video's Ads Tier Loses Dolby Vision HDR and Dolby Atmos - MacRumors
s: February 13, 2024 - Instead of the higher fidelity options previously enjoyed for no additional fee, Prime Video is streaming in HDR10 with Dolby Digital 5.1. That is, unless you pay $2.99 extra for Prime Video's ad-free service, in which case you can retain the higher quality audio experience.
